ie.wit.service.access

Class LoginService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.wit.service.access.LoginService

  • @Service
public class LoginService
extends java.lang.Object
    This service will validate user logins and defer to another service to create the JWT for authentication
    Author:
    Joe Wemyss

      • getUserFromJwt

        public UserEntity getUserFromJwt(java.lang.String jwt)
        This will return a user based on the jwt passed
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the user who was given the JWT

      • validateJwt

        boolean validateJwt(java.lang.String jwt)
        This method will take a JWT in String form and will validate whether the user that sent it is an admin.
        Parameters:
        jwt - the jwt to be validated
        Returns:
        true if the jwt specifies that the user is an admin, false otherwise

      • userValid

        private boolean userValid(UserEntity user,
                          java.lang.String plaintext)
        Validate if the users details are correct.
        Parameters:
        user - the user retrieved from the database
        plaintext - the plaintext password to be compared
        Returns:
        a boolean to denote if the login details are correct
